entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Abbotsford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:47 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, 0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Abbotsford Airport 6:23 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: 0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 56 %
Dewpoint: -7.2°C
Wind: N 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early this evening then changing to snow at times heavy this evening then changing to wet snow at times mixed with rain before morning. Snowfall amount 10 to 20 cm except 25 cm near the mountains. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming south 30 gusting to 60 before morning. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Wet snow at times mixed with rain ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Risk of hail in the afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 after midnight. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
